articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Andy Warhol Marilyn Monroe print sells for $281 million - ABC News
articles.description: The famous print of Marilyn Monroe breaks the record for an American artwork, selling for an eye-watering $281 million.
articles.content:
The Andy Warhol Marilyn print has sold for $US195 million ($281 million) at an auction in New York.
  • Marilyn Monroe print falls short of its projected sale price in the $US200 millions
